title: The Missing Records
description: Use LEFT JOIN to find citizens who might not have job records. Include all citizens even if they're unemployed.
story: Not everyone in the city has a job registered. Use LEFT JOIN to see the complete picture, including those without employment records.
hint: LEFT JOIN keeps all records from the left table (citizens) even if there's no match in the right table (jobs).
tableSetup: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS jobs CASCADE;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS citizens CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE citizens (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100), age INT, district VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE jobs (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, citizen_id INT, company VARCHAR(100), position VARCHAR(100));
